name: Teacher as Beaver
description:
This game is a small part of a huge creative week in Bellecour Ecole.

For more information, check out the Facebook page : https://www.facebook.com/Teachers-As-Beavers-1613792435370804/

The game is in fact a step of the entire project. 

The goal is to protect the bridge from barrels in order to get coins.

You can move left or right in the 3 diferent lanes that the level is composed of. 2 types of objects will arrive at you : branches and barrels. When you see a branch coming, move to its lane and press space key to catch it.

Once you have at least 1 branch, you can start to build constructions in order to block the barrels. Press the up arrow to build a construction on the lane you are. You can upgrade constructions still alive by pressing again the up arrow. Your constructions can have several health point. Each construction cost 1 branch, so you must manage both the catching of branches and the constructions.

At the beginning of the game, don't try to enter a code, this feature make sense only in the global project.
